        Location Iconwebservices@csuchico.eduMore Contact InformationCascade Login(opens in new window)Siteimprove Login(opens in new window)Microsoft Cascade Team(opens in new window)Current page:  WEBS
                                        
    		Welcome to the University Web
    	Web Services is dedicated to helping the University market itself online through a strong, consistently branded web presence.We use the Cascade web content management system (WCMS) to ensure accessibility, security, and ease of use on mobile devices for thousands of pages under the csuchico.edu domain. For more information, see our development standards.
                        Content Updates
                    Although websites are easy to update in the web content management system, we can help! Standard updates can be completed quickly.
                        Branding Resources
                    Find helpful branding resources and best practices for how to use campus framework elements to create consistent user experiences. Change
                        Cascade Training
                    Virtual Cascade Training(opens in new window) takes about two hours to complete. The training is a video series done individually by the user requesting access to edit their department site folder. After completing the training access needs to be requested using the Cascade Access support ticket(opens in new window).
                        Cascade Support
                    Our staff is trained in Cascade. You can request help with technical or publishing and editing issues in Cascade Server.
                        No Charge Services
                    Services to support everyone from the campus community.
                        Charged Services
                    All charges are paid using a CAF, take a look at our charged services.If you are interested in a comprehensive marketing solution for your area, Web Services and Creative Media and Technology can help you.Information TechnologyKendall Hall, 109www.csuchico.edu/itSupport Our CollegeMore in our divisionComputing & Communication ServicesCreative Media & TechnologyEnterprise ApplicationsInformation SecurityInstitutional Research and Strategic Analytics (IRSA)IT Administrative ServiceIT Support ServicesTechnology Equity and Inclusion
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
